scripts.build: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,$SPA_ENV ng build storefrontapp --configuration production
scripts.build:asm: yarn --cwd feature-libs/asm run build:schematics && ng build asm --configuration production
scripts.build:user: yarn --cwd feature-libs/user run build:schematics && ng build user --configuration production
scripts.build:cart: yarn --cwd feature-libs/cart run build:schematics && ng build cart --configuration production
scripts.build:cdc: yarn --cwd integration-libs/cdc run build:schematics && ng build cdc --configuration production
scripts.build:cds: yarn --cwd integration-libs/cds run build:schematics && ng build cds --configuration production
scripts.build:checkout: yarn --cwd feature-libs/checkout run build:schematics && ng build checkout --configuration production
scripts.build:digital-payments: yarn --cwd integration-libs/digital-payments run build:schematics && ng build digital-payments --configuration production
scripts.build:epd-visualization: yarn --cwd integration-libs/epd-visualization run build:schematics && ng build epd-visualization --configuration production
scripts.build:order: yarn --cwd feature-libs/order run build:schematics && ng build order --configuration production
scripts.build:libs: ng build core --configuration production && ng build storefrontlib --configuration production && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail yarn:build:schematics yarn:build:user && yarn build:cart && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail yarn:build:order yarn:build:checkout yarn:build:asm yarn:build:tracking && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail yarn:build:organization yarn:build:product yarn:build:product-configurator yarn:build:storefinder yarn:build:cdc && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail yarn:build:smartedit yarn:build:qualtrics yarn:build:assets yarn:build:cds yarn:build:digital-payments yarn:build:epd-visualization && yarn build:setup
scripts.build:organization: yarn --cwd feature-libs/organization run build:schematics && ng build organization --configuration production
scripts.build:product: yarn --cwd feature-libs/product run build:schematics && ng build product --configuration production
scripts.build:product-configurator: yarn --cwd feature-libs/product-configurator run build:schematics && ng build product-configurator --configuration production
scripts.build:qualtrics: yarn --cwd feature-libs/qualtrics run build:schematics && ng build qualtrics --configuration production
scripts.build:storefinder: yarn --cwd feature-libs/storefinder run build:schematics && ng build storefinder --configuration production
scripts.build:smartedit: yarn --cwd feature-libs/smartedit run build:schematics && ng build smartedit --configuration production
scripts.build:tracking: yarn --cwd feature-libs/tracking run build:schematics && ng build tracking --configuration production
scripts.test:libs: concurrently "ng test core --code-coverage" "ng test storefrontlib --code-coverage" "ng test cart --code-coverage" "ng test organization --code-coverage" "ng test storefinder --code-coverage" "ng test smartedit --code-coverage" "ng test asm --code-coverage" "ng test qualtrics --code-coverage" "ng test product --code-coverage" "ng test product-configurator --code-coverage" "ng test cdc --code-coverage" "ng test setup --code-coverage" "ng test checkout --code-coverage" "ng test order --code-coverage" "ng test digital-payments --code-coverage" "ng test epd-visualization --code-coverage"
scripts.dev:ssr: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,$SPA_ENV cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ng run storefrontapp:serve-ssr
scripts.prerender:dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ng run storefrontapp:prerender --routesFile projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
scripts.dev:cds:ssr: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 SPARTACUS_CDS=true ng run storefrontapp:serve-ssr
scripts.prerender:cds:dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 SPARTACUS_CDS=true ng run storefrontapp:prerender --routesFile projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
